document.full_text: a man who shot dead two convenience store workers in a robbery in 1989 was executed by lethal injection on tuesday, after a legal challenge raising concerns over the drugs used in the execution failed.
document.title: arizona executes convicted killer by lethal injection
lines_and_colors: a man who shot dead two convenience store workers in a robbery in 1989 was executed by lethal injection on tuesday, after a legal challenge raising concerns over the drugs used in the execution failed.
